Charles R. Anastos, Jr. possesses over 23 years of diverse experience in business development, consulting, project management, client management and marketing, primarily in the healthcare industry. He began his career as a research budget officer with the Massachusetts Institute of Technology and continued to flourish at IDX Systems (GE Healthcare), a leading provider of software, services and technology for healthcare provider organizations, as a Manager of Customer Support and later as the Director of Implementations. During his tenure at Beacon Partners Anastos has held the positions of Senior Manager, Vice President â€“ Business Development and currently Senior Vice President.

With multiple affiliations to industry organizations such as HIMSS, MGMA, HFMA, AAHC and New England HIPAA Workgroup, Anastos is also a member of the TEPR Vendor Advisory Board and served as a member on the Advisory Panel for the Center for Healthcare Information Management (CHIM).
